summary: The Western Balkans Democracy and Prosperity Act aims to foster increased trade, investment, and democratic development in the Western Balkans. It addresses issues like corruption, disinformation, cybersecurity, and Russian/Chinese influence. The bill outlines initiatives to promote economic growth, regional integration, cross-cultural engagement, and support the EU and NATO aspirations of Western Balkan countries. It includes provisions for sanctions, reports on malign influence, and initiatives related to cybersecurity. It also focuses on the relationship between Kosovo and Serbia.
